oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Peak effect in Ca3Rh4Sn13: Vortex phase diagram and evidences for stepwise amorphization of flux line lattice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SARKAR, S
BANERJEE, SS
GROVER, AK
RAMAKRISHNAN, S
BHATTACHARYA, S
RAVIKUMAR, G
MISHRA, PK
SAHNI, VC
TOMY, CV
PAUL, DM
BALAKRISHNAN, G
HIGGINS, MJ
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We elucidate the stepwise amorphization of the ordered flux line lattice and construct the vortex phase diagram in Ca3Rh4Sn13 from the study of characteristics of the peak effect phenomenon in ac and de magnetization measurements.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Materials and Mechanisms of Superconductivity High Temperature Superconductors VI,HOUSTON, TEXAS,FEB 20-25, 2000
